Detailed Description

Internal UNIT level API, called by MODULE.

Function Documentation

void* gtrack_unitCreate ( TrackingParams *  params,
int32_t *  errCode 
)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to instantiate GTRACK Unit with desired configuration parameters. Function returns a handle, which is used my module to call units' methods

Parameters
[in]paramsThis is a pointer to the configuration structure. The structure contains all parameters that are exposed by GTRACK alrorithm. The configuration does not need to persist.
[out]errCodeError code populated on error, see Algorithm Error codes
Return values
Handleto GTRACK unit
void gtrack_unitDelete ( void *  handle)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to delete the instance of GTRACK Unit

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTARCK unit
Return values
None
void gtrack_unitEvent ( void *  handle,
uint16_t  num 
)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to run GTRACK unit level state machine

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTARCK unit
[in]numThis is number of associated measurments
Return values
None
void gtrack_unitPredict ( void *  handle)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to run GTRACK unit prediction step

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTRACK unit
Return values
None
void gtrack_unitReport ( void *  handle,
GTRACK_targetDesc *  target 
)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to report GTRACK unit results to the target descriptor

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTRACK unit
[in]targetThis is a pointer to a target descriptor
Return values
None
void gtrack_unitScore ( void *  handle,
GTRACK_measurementPoint *  point,
float *  bestScore,
uint8_t *  bestInd,
uint16_t  num 
)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to obtain the measurement vector scoring from the GTRACK unit perspective

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTRACK unit
[in]pointThis is an array of measurement points
[in,out]bestScoreThis is a pointer current scoresheet with best scores. Only better scores are updated
[in,out]bestIndThis is a pointer current scoresheet winners. Only better scores winners are updated
[in]numNumber of measurement points
Return values
None
void gtrack_unitStart ( void *  handle,
uint64_t  timeStamp,
uint32_t  tid,
float *  um 
)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to start target tracking. This function is called during modules' allocation step, once new set of points passes allocation thresholds

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTRACK unit
[in]timeStampThis is an allocation time stamp
[in]tidThis is a target identifier given to a unit
[in]umThis is a pointer to the parental centroid
Return values
None
void gtrack_unitStop ( void *  handle)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to stop target tracking. This function is called when Tracking state transitions to FREE

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTRACK unit
Return values
None
TrackState gtrack_unitUpdate ( void *  handle,
GTRACK_measurementPoint *  point,
GTRACK_measurementVariance *  var,
uint8_t *  pInd,
uint16_t  num 
)

Description
GTRACK Module calls this function to perform an update step for the tracking unit.

Parameters
[in]handleThis is handle to GTRACK unit
[in]pointThis is an array of measurement points
[in]varPointer to an array of input measurment variances. Shall be set to NULL if variances are unknown
[in]pIndThis is an array of associated UIDs. After association and allocation steps, each measurment shall have a UID assigned.
[in]numNumber of measurement points
Return values
None
